cleaned_text: Our Team Leadership [Tracy Scheller, MD](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/providers/tracy-scheller) Medical Director Dr. Scheller is a board-certified gynecologist and is the medical director of the Graf Center for Integrative Medicine at Englewood Health. She holds a master of science in nutrition from Columbia University and is now pursuing an integrative medicine fellowship from the University of Arizona. Staff and Instructors Our team includes licensed/certified acupuncturists, yoga instructors, holistic nutritionists and dietitians, massage therapists, meditation instructors, Reiki practitioners, and more.
